response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire a remarkable product that I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its intrinsic value and the unique features it offers, I understand its worth to you is $1,500,000. After careful consideration, I propose to sell this product to you at a special offer price of $1,350,000. This offer represents a significant value compared to its market worth and provides you with a substantial savings. I trust this proposal aligns with your expectations and budget. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1350000}
